name: picOS 2.0
description:
Can you get the blue screen of death? Can you beat the painful virus hidden in another program? Can you complete the ritual? That, and more, is right here, in picOS 2.0!

This is a sequel to my previous (and not very good) adventure into a desktop-like thing: https://void-gamesplay.itch.io/pic-os. I completely redid everything, and although not super optimized , it works okay, and has some secrets and easter eggs.

The game is also on the pico8 forums: https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?pid=122190#p.
